ValidationRule.description: Activation Start Date should be less than or equal to QUT Giving Start Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED(Activation_Start_Date__c) ), NOT(ISBLANK(Activation_Start_Date__c)), Activation_Start_Date__c > QUT_Giving_Publish_Start_Date__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Activation Start Date should be less than or equal to Publishing Start Date
